a1.name: Vorpal Sword
a1.notes: Attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places an extra hit if the target has any active skills on cooldown. Each hit has an 80% chance of decreasing the duration of a random buff on the target by 1 turn.

a2.name: Clockwork Cyclone
a2.notes: Attacks all enemies. 75% chance to increase the cooldowns of all enemy skills by 2 turns. 75% chance to decrease each target’s Turn Meter by 15% (or 30% if a skill is maxed).

a3.name: Queenslayer
a3.notes: Attacks 1 enemy, ignores 20% of the target’s DEF. If the initial target is killed, also attacks the enemy with the lowest HP (ignores 20% DEF again).

passive.impact: [Passive] Whenever this Champion attacks, inflicts 3% bonus damage to each target for each turn remaining on all of their skill’s cooldowns. [Active] Resets the cooldown of one of this Champion’s skills each time they kill an enemy (once per skill).

booking.notes: Books increase damage, debuff chance, and reduce cooldowns.

damage_per_turn.a3: Very high single-target burst, especially if chain triggers

rotation.average_damage: High in short battles, moderate in long fights
rotation.extra_turn_frequency: Passive resets skill cooldowns on kill; no true extra turns

scenarios.notes: Maximizes burst on A3, especially if chain triggers
Adds extra damage on A1/A2, but not optimal for CB role
Best for boss nuking, especially Fire Knight

clan_boss.notes: Single-target damage is good, but lacks debuffs and utility for Clan Boss. Not recommended for main CB team.

synergy.relentless_viability: Not recommended; skill set does not benefit from extra turns

investment.notes: Top-tier for cooldown control and single-target nuking. Excels in Arena, Eternal Dragon, and Fire Knight.

owned_comparison.comparison: Trunda is a stronger AOE nuker, Alice brings more control.
Foli offers more survivability, Alice has better cooldown control.

draft_logic.notes: Excellent first or counter-pick for control teams.

turn_meter.extra_turn_effects: Passive resets skill cooldowns on kill; no extra turns

gear_set_stability.Relentless: Not recommended; no extra turn synergy.

utility_comparison.comparison: Trunda outperforms Alice in AOE damage, Alice brings more control.
Foli brings more survivability, Alice has better cooldown control.

final_summary.mastery_preference: Helmsmasher for Arena, Warmaster for PvE
final_summary.booking_impact: High; books help but not mandatory
final_summary.damage_rotation: Open with A2 for control, A3 for single-target burst
final_summary.turn_meter_stability: Stable; passive resets skills on kill
final_summary.passive_impact: Significant bonus damage and skill cycling
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize ATK, C.DMG, SPD, ACC; Savage set for nuking
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Works best with ATK buffers and debuffers
final_summary.draft_value: First or counter-pick for control teams
final_summary.investment_value: High; top-tier for control and nuking

team_setups.name: Arena Control Nuking Team
team_setups.strategy: Speed boost, ATK up, DEF down, then Alice A2/A3 for control and nuke

similar_champions.similarity_reason: Both are single-target nukers with high ATK scaling
